testcase.name: Add New Customer
testcase.system-out: Given User Launch Chrome browser............................................passed When User open URL "https://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login?ReturnUrl=%2Fadmin%2F".passed And User enters Email as "admin@yourstore.com" and password as "admin"......passed And click on login button...................................................passed Then User can view Dashboard................................................passed When User click on customers Menu...........................................passed And click on customers Menu Item............................................passed And click on Add new Button.................................................passed Then User can view Add new customers page...................................passed When user enter customer info...............................................passed And click on save button....................................................passed Then User can view confirmation message "The new customer has been added successfully.".passed And close browser...........................................................undefined
